quoteText: Cengage reserves the right (but has no obligation) to pre-screen, review, flag, filter, modify, refuse, or remove Content from the Services.
title: Cengage reserves the right to pre-screen, review, flag, filter, modify, refuse, or remove Content from the Services.

tosdr.case: The service can delete specific content without prior notice and without a reason
tosdr.tldr: The Terms of Use state "Cengage reserves the right (but has no obligation) to pre-screen, review, flag, filter, modify, refuse, or remove Content from the Services."
